metadata.description: The undead horror returns, and now unleashed in America in double-sized issues!  Sheriff Kat Noble keeps the peace on a quiet border town.  But as young girls start to go missing, she's pulled into a supernatural slaughterhouse and stumbles into the makings of the ultimate terror plot – Stitched loose in the streets of the USA! Pat Shand and Daniel (Uber) Gete make America scared again!
metadata.name: Stitched: Terror
